name: The Risk Room! A Platformer
description:
--Story--

➡ You wake up in a strange red room and a voice is from within it tells you the only way to escape is to follow their instructions. You must escape or you will be stuck with the red monsters forever.

--Controls & More-    ➡ WASD and/or ARROW KEYS to move around ➡ Avoid the spider-looking creatures and the flying bats in the rooms. Oh, and dont hit the spikes too lol

➡ The spinning exit circle is your portal to escape the room.

➡ There are 20 levels in which all are possible. There is also a timer that runs while you play. Can you beat your personal best? (WORLD RECORD COUNTER ONLY WORKS IN SCRATCH)

--Credits--

➡ All art and code made by me. 

Music: Deep Space

Follow me for more games! Sorry it took me a while to make this game, I procrastinated a lot and I'm trying to work on my procrastination XD
